House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07995
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING JULY 27 OF EVERY YEAR AS A SPECIAL NON-WORKING HOLIDAY IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY IN VITAL RECOGNITION AND COMMEMORATION OF THE FOUNDING OF IGLESIA NI CRISTO
ABSTRACT : Seeks to recognize and commemorate the founding of the Iglesia ni Cristo, by declaring July 27 of every year as a special non-working holiday in the entire country.
